tweets.text: Why are the authorities @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK so slow to act? It's exactly the same with banning woodburning in urban areas and tackling #AirPollution - feet dragging all the way https://t.co/UzPO1YkgKF

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK It's truly unbelievable that the agencies entrusted to protect people's physical/mental health and quality of life are failing to do so. The evidence of the presence of dangerous and noxious gas is overwhelming. So, why no action?

tweets.text: @Sotlive @StinkStopthe It makes you wonder how robust the checking of previous loads of waste was going back to the beginning and up to 10 May? Is there a paper trail outlining every single source of waste? Needs investigating.

urls.title: Oxford Flood Alleviation Scheme - Welcome - Environment Agency - Citizen Space
urls.description: Find and participate in consultations run by the Environment Agency

tweets.text: We've opened an online Q and A about the proposed #OxfordFloodScheme at https://t.co/MBwIgOKqgG ‚Äì please get your Qs in by 31 May. It's a great opportunity for flood defence work to create a beautiful asset for the local community. https://t.co/L9Xes0zUvH

Hang on a minute -isn‚Äôt this the point when the @EnvAgency were gaslighting the town saying they had no evidence of a problem?So it took how many months to monitor the site when it had gone up to +4000 ppm? 8/9 months?WHAT? @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @MattHancock #stopthestink https://t.co/Ua5rlgpn4I

urls.title: Boater fined for not registering boat
urls.description: A boater has been fined almost ¬£1,000 for leaving his boat unregistered on the River Glen in Lincolnshire.
